subject: please send proof of paymen
body:
please send proof of payment

Ahmed

subject: Re:    please send proof of paymen
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I would be happy to assist you further. Could you please provide me with more details about the payment? For instance, when was it made and what method was used? This will help me track down the information more efficiently.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Ryan
